title: Electricity From A Soccer Ball? This Startup’s Kinetic Energy Tech Is Lighting The Developing World [VIDEO]
text:
Electricity From A Soccer Ball? This Startup’s Kinetic Energy Tech Is Lighting The Developing World [VIDEO] Oct 10, 2015 
Jessica Matthews has a grand vision for the future, a future in which national grids are supplemented by everyday objects. A future in which objects generate electricity, just by moving them around. "The grid cannot scale sustainably," she said. This future, Matthews said, can help bring power to those who need it most.
